articles.content: Full service on the Morris & Essex lines and the Gladstone Branch will not return Monday as NJ Transit officials had hoped after bad weekend weather dropped another tree on the storm battered rai… [+3747 chars]

articles.author: Cory Dinkel
articles.title: Police investigate shooting outside Raleigh McDonald's - WRAL News
articles.description: The Raleigh Police Department is investigating a shooting that happened outside a McDonald's in Raleigh Sunday.
articles.content:
Raleigh, N.C. — An 18-year-old has been charged with murder following a shooting that happened Sunday evening outside a McDonald's in Raleigh.
